metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9108 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the js_regcomp function in regexp.c in Artifex Software, Inc. MuJS before commit b6de34ac6d8bb7dd5461c57940acfbd3ee7fd93e allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted regular expression.

notes.Note: ratliff> mujs is included in thirdparty directory of mupdf

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
